languages.text: "Будем молиться вместе, и надеяться на лучшее".

traits.locale_text: "Будем молиться вместе, и надеяться на лучшее".

languages.text: "Let us pray together and hope that the decision was right."
languages.original_text: "Будем молиться вместе, и надеяться на лучшее".

languages.text: 「共に祈り、この決断が正しかったと願おう」
languages.original_text: "Let us pray together and hope that the decision was right."

traits.locale_text: 「共に祈り、この決断が正しかったと願おう」

languages.text: “我们一起祈祷吧，希望这个决定做得没错。”
languages.original_text: "Let us pray together and hope that the decision was right."

traits.locale_text: “我们一起祈祷吧，希望这个决定做得没错。”

languages.text: "Beten wir gemeinsam und hoffen, dass diese Entscheidung richtig war."
languages.original_text: "Let us pray together and hope that the decision was right."

traits.locale_text: "Beten wir gemeinsam und hoffen, dass diese Entscheidung richtig war."

languages.text: « Prions ensemble et espérons que notre décision était la bonne. »
languages.original_text: "Let us pray together and hope that the decision was right."

traits.locale_text: « Prions ensemble et espérons que notre décision était la bonne. »

languages.text: «Recemos juntos y confiemos en que haya sido la decisión correcta».
languages.original_text: "Let us pray together and hope that the decision was right."

traits.locale_text: «Recemos juntos y confiemos en que haya sido la decisión correcta».

languages.text: "Birlikte dua edelim ve doğru kararı verdiğimizi umalım."
languages.original_text: "Let us pray together and hope that the decision was right."

traits.locale_text: "Birlikte dua edelim ve doğru kararı verdiğimizi umalım."
